Class HiveMetastores

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.hiveio.common.HiveMetastores

extends Object
    Wrapper around Thrift MetasStore client with helper methods.

        Parameters:
        host - Host to connect to
        port - Port to connect on
        timeoutMillis - Socket timeout

        Hive Thrift Metastore client

      • create

        public static org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.api.ThriftHiveMetastore.Iface create(String host,
                                                                    int port)
                                                                             throws org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportException
        Create client from host and port with default timeout
        Parameters:
        host - Host to connect to
        port - Port to connect to
        Returns:
        Thrift Hive interface connected to host:port
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportException - network problems

      • create

        public static org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.api.ThriftHiveMetastore.Iface create(org.apache.hadoop.hive.conf.HiveConf hiveConf)
                                                                             throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        Create client from a HiveConf. First we try to read the URIs out of the HiveConf and connect to those. If that fails we create Hive's client and grab the thrift connection out of that using reflection.
        Parameters:
        hiveConf - HiveConf to use
        Returns:
        Thrift Hive client
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException - network problems
